clinical_study.brief_title: Gut Microbiota and Bile Acids in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
clinical_study.official_title: Gut Microbiota and Bile Acids Mediate the Clinical Benefits of Metformin and YH1 in Patients With Treatment-naïve Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus: A Pilot Observational Study

brief_summary.textblock: The investigators will evaluate the stool microbiota, serum and fecal bile acid composition, and changes in blood glucose and lipid profile before and after one month of metformin or YH1 treatment.

primary_outcome.description: before and after YH1 or metformin treatment

study_pop.textblock: Outpatients and treatment-naïve male patients with type 2 diabetes
